Expected in cases where the role was granted using the internal {AccessControl-_grantRole}."},"RoleRevoked(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is revoked `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call:   - if using `revokeRole`, it is the admin role bearer   - if using `renounceRole`, it is the role bearer (i.e. `account`)"},"Unpaused(address)":{"details":"Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`."}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"buyTokens(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"maxSofAmount":"Maximum $SOF willing to spend (slippage protection)","tokenAmount":"Amount of raffle tokens to buy"}},"calculateBuyPrice(uint256)":{"params":{"tokenAmount":"Amount of tokens to buy"},"returns":{"_0":"Total $SOF base cost"}},"calculateSellPrice(uint256)":{"params":{"tokenAmount":"Amount of tokens to sell"},"returns":{"_0":"$SOF base amount to be returned"}},"extractSof(address,uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"Amount of $SOF to extract","to":"Address to send the $SOF to (usually prize distributor)"}},"getRoleAdmin(bytes32)":{"details":"Returns the admin role that controls `role`. :/ipfs/QmWh6R35SarhAn4z2wH8SU456jJSYL2FgucfTFgbHJJN4E"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/introspection/IERC165.sol":{"keccak256":"0x8891738ffe910f0cf2da09566928589bf5d63f4524dd734fd9cedbac3274dd5c","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://971f954442df5c2ef5b5ebf1eb245d7105d9fbacc7386ee5c796df1d45b21617","dweb:/ipfs/QmadRjHbkicwqwwh61raUEapaVEtaLMcYbQZWs9gUkgj3u"]},"src/core/IRaffle.sol":{"keccak256":"0xe04181cc7099776f1c12916bd5c3d4e082e8f401a163d3b80e059d7bfa3dfbac","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://69d6001e510168d398ce992f9907b4ac396a6454747919d1eb013a3d4014f5d5","dweb:/ipfs/Qma18hdfdX6ZuG1BE1P9JUkJxE1cKJkxLbum9o6UuPmuQ1"]},"src/curve/IRaffleToken.sol":{"keccak256":"0xbdbe9210095b6522a9adbecca66a271bd052a1b0f0d9ecccb799e23c893f0fd4","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://0ed5142b72657d775b137362289bdb0240edbe52908b270eb615f98e63d1bf34","dweb:/ipfs/QmTiwxQvzcdzRjqvZp72ggWQRCPpBWXS4af1VQtLrMZdsN"]},"src/curve/SOFBondingCurve.sol":{"keccak256":"0x4e739f8393361df6a2a152ab35d40bdb90a5c3f6f7957a379464176c9e8146bb","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://f42c2266bf35d073df5b59d1b574812e7f1cb97006558a39954e32139f1e2f89","dweb:/ipfs/QmPKj81vYN1on7iUUSGYb9ZXyiiBF6ZynPjS6rVmaRQfn1"]}},"version":1}

params.tokenAmount: Amount of raffle tokens to buy

params.to: Address to send the $SOF to (usually prize distributor)

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

params._bondSteps: Array of BondStep defining the pricing curve
params._raffleToken: Address of the raffle token for this season

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

params.tokenAmount: Amount of raffle tokens to sell

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See the corresponding https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165#how-interfaces-are-identified[ERC section] to learn more about how these ids are created. This function call must use less than 30 000 gas.

calculateBuyPrice(uint256).notice: Calculate the $SOF cost to buy a certain amount of tokens (base cost, excl. fee)

calculateSellPrice(uint256).notice: Calculate the $SOF received from selling a certain amount of tokens (base return, excl. fee)

getSofReserves().notice: Getter for current $SOF reserves tracked by the curve

initializeCurve(address,(uint128,uint128.notice: Initialize the bonding curve for a new season

lockTrading().notice: Lock trading at season end (called by Raffle contract)

setRaffleInfo(address,uint256).notice: Set the raffle contract and season id for participant callbacks
